settings.title: Vodafone drivexone settings
settings.intro: Before you can add your drivexone devices you need to enter your username and password for the drivexone services first. These settings are stored locally on your Homey.
settings.instruction: Configure your tracking device and complete setup with the drivexone smartphone app first if you don't have it yet.

messages.busySaving: Account settings valid, saving to Homey...
messages.confirmClearAccount: Are you sure you want to clear the account? Tracking will stop and configured devices will stop working.

errorValidation.no_vehicles: Something went wrong contacting the server

messages.errorSaving: Error saving account settings to Homey

start.title: Add tracking device
start.intro: If a valid account is configured in the app settings sections of Homey, the trackers in your drivexone account will be listed.

messages.errorNoSettings: No account configured in the app settings section.
messages.errorInvalidSettings: Invalid account configured in the app settings sections.
